description: This is the second 0.5 credit course in a two course series that is part of the Engineering Fellows experience. Students engage in a team-based engineering design project alongside a domain expert within the St. Olaf Community. Students also participate in professional development activities in preparation for continuing in the field of engineering and engage in a community based activity to support youth interest in engineering. Prerequisite: ENGR 390; Open only to juniors and seniors.
name: Engineering Fellows II
notes: This course includes an academic civic engagement (ACE) component.
prerequisites: ENGR 390; Open only to juniors and seniors.
